item.title: Staff zone and Donor zone commands? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ston3 ston3
item.description:
@ston3 wrote:

This is what I have for my PI source

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2012, 4751, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staffzone!"); }

insert that command right under “moderatorcommands” if that’s how yours is layed out
If not, just simply add an “&& playerrights => 1” after the brackets. Goodluck!

Read full topic
